info.title: SuperOffice Agent API v1
info.termsOfService: You must be an authorized user to access this API.

post.summary: Read a row from a table

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: TableName, Id

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of properties to include in the result. Other fields are then nulled out to reduce payload size: "Name,department,category". Default = show all fields.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code.

parameters.name: SO-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code. Overrides Accept-Language value.

parameters.name: SO-Culture
parameters.description: Number, date formatting in a specified culture (iso2 language) code. Partially overrides SO-Language/Accept-Language value. Ignored if no Language set.

parameters.name: SO-TimeZone
parameters.description: Specify the timezone code that you would like date/time responses converted to.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

parameters.name: $select

parameters.name: SO-AppToken

post.summary: Mass-insert rows, with or without primary keys specified.
post.description:
Works on physical tables with no special processing for udef etc.; traveltransactionlog and WebHooks are supported
NsApiSlow threshold: 5000 ms.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: TableName, Columns, Data

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of properties to include in the result. Other fields are then nulled out to reduce payload size: "Name,department,category". Default = show all fields.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code.

parameters.name: SO-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code. Overrides Accept-Language value.

parameters.name: SO-Culture
parameters.description: Number, date formatting in a specified culture (iso2 language) code. Partially overrides SO-Language/Accept-Language value. Ignored if no Language set.

parameters.name: SO-TimeZone
parameters.description: Specify the timezone code that you would like date/time responses converted to.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

post.summary: Drop all rows in a table.
post.description:
This clearance is not individually logged in TravelTransactionlog or Webhook/script calls
NsApiSlow threshold: 5000 ms.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: TableName

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of properties to include in the result. Other fields are then nulled out to reduce payload size: "Name,department,category". Default = show all fields.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code.

parameters.name: SO-Language

parameters.name: SO-TimeZone
parameters.description: Specify the timezone code that you would like date/time responses converted to.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

post.summary: Insert or update rows, optionally deleting/zeroing 'leftover' rows.
post.description:
Special support for UDEF, as well as optional extensive information return. Traveltransactionlog and WebHooks are supported
NsApiSlow threshold: 5000 ms.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: TableName, Columns, Keys, Data, NomatchAction, ReturnRowStatus

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of properties to include in the result. Other fields are then nulled out to reduce payload size: "Name,department,category". Default = show all fields.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code.

parameters.name: SO-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code. Overrides Accept-Language value.

parameters.name: SO-Culture
parameters.description: Number, date formatting in a specified culture (iso2 language) code. Partially overrides SO-Language/Accept-Language value. Ignored if no Language set.

parameters.name: SO-TimeZone
parameters.description: Specify the timezone code that you would like date/time responses converted to.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

post.summary: Delete rows, by primary key; traveltransactionlog and WebHooks are supported

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: TableName, IDs

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of properties to include in the result. Other fields are then nulled out to reduce payload size: "Name,department,category". Default = show all fields.

parameters.name: Accept-Language

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.DatabaseT.description: ReadRow: Read a row from a table

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.TableRecord.description:
The extra table entity contains meta data for an extra table (not implemented yet)
<para />
Carrier object for TableRecord.
Services for the TableRecord Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IDatabaseTableAgent">DatabaseTable Agent</see>.

Values.description: Values for the row, where the first string is the column name (e.g. x_number), and the second string is the value formatted as a DB-value, e.g. [I:42]

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.TableRight.description:
Wraps a table right together with an explanatory reason.
Code can indicate why access is restricted.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.FieldProperty.description: Class holding properties like field length, field type about a field in the carrier.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.FieldRight.description:
Wraps the field right together with an explanatory reason.
Also adds logical operators to the field rights so that they can be easily combined.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.DatabaseT.description: InsertRow: Insert a row into a table
UpdateRow: Update a row in a table
DeleteRow: Delete a row from a table
Insert: Mass-insert rows, with or without primary keys specified. Works on physical tables with no special processing for udef etc.; traveltransactionlog and WebHooks are supported

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.MassOperationRe.description:
Information about the results of a mass-update operation
<para />
Carrier object for MassOperationResult.
Services for the MassOperationResult Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IDatabaseTableAgent">DatabaseTable Agent</see>.

Message.description: Any message from the method, including timing data

RowStatus.description: Array of statuses and primary keys for all rows that were specified. Populated if the 'ReturnRowStatus' parameter of 'Upsert' is set, otherwise null

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.UpsertRowStatus.description:
Information about a row of the results of a mass-update operation
<para />
Carrier object for UpsertRowStatus.
Services for the UpsertRowStatus Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IDatabaseTableAgent">DatabaseTable Agent</see>.

PrimaryKey.description: The primary key of the target table, that matches the keys specified in the data row

RowKeys.description: The key values given in the incoming 'data' parameter to the Upsert call, in the order they were speicifed in the 'keys' array

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.DatabaseT.description: Truncate: Drop all rows in a table. This clearance is not individually logged in TravelTransactionlog or Webhook/script calls
Upsert: Insert or update rows, optionally deleting/zeroing 'leftover' rows. Special support for UDEF, as well as optional extensive information return. Traveltransactionlog and WebHooks are supported
Delete: Delete rows, by primary key; traveltransactionlog and WebHooks are supported

SuperOffice Password.description:
SuperOffice username:password are passed in Base64-encoded. 

You can also pass inn an unencoded ticket 7T:abc== with the HTTP Authenticate header.

SuperId Authentication.description:
SuperOffice SuperId OAuth implicit flow. 
You need to issue a request to the SuperId authorization URL
    https://online.superoffice.com/login/common/oauth/authorize?response_type=token
      &client_id=670734e0-4c5a-11e3-be9e-a171392e81db
      &redirect_uri=https://example.com/spa/

passing in the application id and redirect URL.

SuperId will log the user in, and redirect to the requested redirect URL with a #payload
containing the access token and claims. (The redirect URL must be registered with SuperId in advance)

   https://example.com/spa#access_token=8A%3aCust12227.AXRrCITpPBvQX3UbIohb
      &token_type=bearer
      &state=
      &expires_in=3600
      &ctx=Cust12227
      &netserver_url=https%3a%2f%2fsod.superoffice.com%2fCust12227%2fRemote%2fServices82%2f

You can take the #access_token value and pass it as the Authenticate HTTP header as a BEARER token.

externalDocs.description: The SuperOffice DevNet Community has more documentation, examples, and discussion forums.
